Detailed Description

The IVtdApi abstract VtdApi class.

virtual ConnectionHandle VTD::IVtdApi::connectRDB ( const std::string &  hostname,
unsigned int  rdbPortNumber = DEFAULT_RDB_PORT,
Protocols::Enum  rdbProtocol = Protocols::RDB_TCP,
bool  directMode = false 
) [pure virtual]

connectRDB - connect to port to receive SCP messages

Parameters:
hostname - host name for UDP usually adrress is broadcast adrress
rdbPortNumber - port number for general message we used 48190 for TCP and 48190 and 48191 for UDP
rdbProtocol - type of protocoll TCP or UDP
directMode - pass received messages directly to callbacks (false = use internal buffer; need to call update() to process the buffer)
Returns:
communication handle

virtual ConnectionHandle VTD::IVtdApi::connectSCP ( const std::string &  hostname,
unsigned int  scpPortNumber = DEFAULT_SCP_PORT,
bool  directMode = false 
) [pure virtual]

Parameters:
hostname - host name
scpPortNumber - port number usually 48179
directModeForStates - use directMode for updating the internal VTD state
Returns:
return - communication handler

const RDB_MSG_t &  msg 
) [pure virtual]

Send an RDB message to the connected VTD client.

Parameters:
msg a reference to the RDB_MSG_t that is to be sent.
handle the connection handle to which the messages shall be sent. If 0 the message will be broadcast.

virtual void VTD::IVtdApi::startSimulation ( OperationMode::Enum  mode = OperationMode::UNSET,
float  maxDuration = -1.0f,
bool  isBlocking = true,
const double &  timeOut = MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT 
) [pure virtual]

start the simulation

Parameters:
mode The OperationMode in which to start the simulation
duration The duration for which to run the simulation, in seconds. Default: -1.0f. Give a negative value to run the simulation indefinitely.
timeOut - time to time out not to block application for ever

virtual void VTD::IVtdApi::stepSimulation ( int  stepSize,
bool  isBlocking = true,
const double &  timeOut = MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT 
) [pure virtual]

Parameters:
stepSize - size of step
isBlocking - block until OperationStage::RUN und OperationStage::PAUSE are reached
timeOut - time to time out not to block application for ever
